00296 inline void InputInit(SimStruct *S,int_T Nb,int_T *Dim,int_T *DFT)
00297 {
00298     int_T i;
00299     if (!ssSetNumInputPorts(S,Nb)) return;
00300 
00301     for (i=0;i<Nb;i++)
00302     {
00303         ssSetInputPortWidth(S, i, Dim[i]);
00304         ssSetInputPortDirectFeedThrough(S, i, DFT[i]);
00305     }
00306 }
00307 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00308 inline void OutputInit(SimStruct *S,int_T Nb,int_T *Dim)
00309 {
00310     int_T i;
00311     if (!ssSetNumOutputPorts(S,Nb)) return;
00312     for (i=0;i<Nb;i++)
00313         ssSetOutputPortWidth(S, i, Dim[i]);
00314 }
00315 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00316 void mdlCheckParameters(SimStruct *S);
00317 inline void ParamInit(SimStruct *S,int_T Nb,int_T *Dim,int_T *Fix)
00318 {
00319     int_T i;
00320     
00321     ssSetNumSFcnParams(S, Nb);
00322     for (i=0;i<Nb;i++)
00323     {
00324         if (Fix[i]==1)
00325             ssSetSFcnParamNotTunable(S,i);
00326     }
00327 
00328     if (ssGetSFcnParamsCount(S) != Nb) 
00329     {
00330         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: %i parameters are expected",Nb);
00331         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00332         return;
00333     }
00334 
00335     mdlCheckParameters(S);
00336     if (ssGetErrorStatus(S)!=NULL)
00337         return;
00338 }
00339 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00340 inline void WorkVectorInit(SimStruct *S,int_T DimVR,int_T DimVI,int_T DimVP)
00341 {
00342     ssSetNumRWork(S, DimVR);
00343     ssSetNumIWork(S, DimVI);
00344     ssSetNumPWork(S, DimVP);
00345 }
00346 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00347 inline void StateInit(SimStruct *S,int_T DimEC,int_T DimED)
00348 {
00349     ssSetNumContStates(S,DimEC);
00350     ssSetNumDiscStates(S,DimED);
00351 }
00352 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00353 InputVector::InputVector(SimStruct *S,int_T port)
00354     : RVector(ssGetInputPortWidth(S,port))
00355 {
00356     int_T i;
00357     InputRealPtrsType uPtrs = ssGetInputPortRealSignalPtrs(S,port);
00358     for (i=0;i<D;i++)
00359         T[i]=(*uPtrs[i]);
00360 }
00361 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00362 void InputVector::operator=(const RVector & V)
00363 {
00364     RVector::operator =(V);
00365 }
00366 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00367 inline InputIVector::InputIVector(SimStruct *S,int_T port)
00368     : IVector(ssGetInputPortWidth(S,port))
00369 {
00370     int_T i;
00371     InputRealPtrsType uPtrs = ssGetInputPortRealSignalPtrs(S,port);
00372     for (i=0;i<D;i++)
00373         T[i]=Round(*uPtrs[i]);
00374 }
00375 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00376 inline void InputIVector::operator=(const IVector & V)
00377 {
00378     IVector::operator =(V);
00379 }
00380 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------

00384 }

00400 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00401 inline real_T  InputValue(SimStruct *S,int_T port)
00402 {
00403     return *(ssGetInputPortRealSignalPtrs(S,port)[0]);
00404 }
00405 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00406 inline void WriteOutputValue(SimStruct *S,int_T port,real_T val)
00407 {
00408     real_T *x=ssGetOutputPortRealSignal(S,port);
00409     x[0]=val;
00410 }
00411 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00412 inline real_T  ParamValue(SimStruct *S,int_T port)
00413 {
00414     return mxGetPr(ssGetSFcnParam(S,port))[0];
00415 }
00416 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00417 inline void ParamString(SimStruct *S,int_T port,String &C)
00418 {
00419     if (mxGetString(ssGetSFcnParam(S,port), C, StringSize))
00420     {
00421         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Parameter port %i must be a string",port);
00422         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00423         return;
00424     }
00425 }
00426 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00427 inline int_T InputWidth(SimStruct *S,int_T port)
00428 {
00429     return ssGetInputPortWidth(S,port);
00430 }
00431 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00432 inline int_T OutputWidth(SimStruct *S,int_T port)
00433 {
00434     return ssGetOutputPortWidth(S,port);
00435 }
00436 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00437 inline int_T ParamWidth(SimStruct *S,int_T port)
00438 {
00439     return mxGetNumberOfElements(ssGetSFcnParam(S,port));
00440 }

00501 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00502 inline const mxArray * ExistMatlabMatrix(String Name,String Site)
00503 {
00504     const mxArray *A;
00505     const mxArray *B;
00506 #ifdef V5_COMPAT
00507     A=mexGetArrayPtr(Name,Site);
00508 #else
00509     A=mexGetVariablePtr(Site,Name); 
00510 #endif   
00511     if (A && mxIsDouble(A))
00512         B=A;
00513     else
00514         B=NULL;
00515     return B;
00516 }
00517 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00518 inline const mxArray * ExistMatlabMatrix(String Name,String Site,int_T  nbl,int_T nbc)
00519 {
00520     const mxArray *A;
00521     const mxArray *B;
00522 #ifdef V5_COMPAT
00523     A=mexGetArrayPtr(Name,Site);
00524 #else
00525     A=mexGetVariablePtr(Site,Name); 
00526 #endif    
00527     if (A && mxIsDouble(A))
00528         B=A;
00529     else
00530         B=NULL;
00531     return B;
00532 }
00533 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00534 inline const mxArray * CreateMatlabMatrix(String Name,String Site,int_T  nbl,int_T nbc)
00535 {
00536     mxArray *A;
00537     const mxArray *B;
00538     A=mxCreateDoubleMatrix(nbc,nbl, mxREAL);
00539     if (!A)
00540     {
00541         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Could not create double matrix named '%s'.\n",Name);
00542         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00543     }
00544 #ifdef V5_COMPAT
00545     mxSetName(A,Name); 
00546     mexPutArray(A,Site);
00547 #else 
00548     if (mexPutVariable(Site,Name,A))
00549     {
00550         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Could not put variable '%s' in '%s' workspace.\n",Name,Site);
00551         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00552     }
00553 #endif  
00554     mxDestroyArray(A);
00555 #ifdef V5_COMPAT
00556     B=mexGetArrayPtr(Name,Site);
00557 #else
00558     B=mexGetVariablePtr(Site,Name); 
00559 #endif  
00560     return B;
00561 }
00562 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00563 inline MatlabMatrix::MatlabMatrix(String Name,String Site) : RMatrix(0,0,NULL)
00564 {
00565     const mxArray *A=ExistMatlabMatrix(Name,Site);
00566     
00567     if (A)
00568     {
00569         T=mxGetPr(A);
00570         L=mxGetN(A);
00571         C=mxGetM(A);
00572     }
00573     else
00574     {
00575         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: No double matrix named '%s' exists !.\n",Name);
00576         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00577     }
00578 }
00579 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00580 inline MatlabMatrix::MatlabMatrix(SimStruct *S,int_T port) : RMatrix(0,0,NULL)
00581 {
00582     const mxArray *A;   
00583     String Name;
00584     ParamString(S,port,Name);
00585     
00586     A=ExistMatlabMatrix(Name,"base");
00587     if (A)
00588     {
00589         T=mxGetPr(A); 
00590         L=mxGetN(A);
00591         C=mxGetM(A);
00592     }
00593     else
00594     {
00595         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: No double matrix named '%s' exists !.\n",Name);
00596         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00597     }
00598 }
00599 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00600 inline MatlabMatrix::MatlabMatrix(String Name,String Site,int_T nbl,int_T nbc,real_T valini) : RMatrix(nbl,nbc,NULL)
00601 {
00602     const mxArray *A=ExistMatlabMatrix(Name,Site,nbl,nbc);
00603 
00604     if (A)
00605     {   // The matrix exists
00606         T=mxGetPr(A);
00607     }
00608     else
00609     {   // The matrix doesn't exist
00610         A=CreateMatlabMatrix(Name,Site,nbl,nbc);
00611         T=mxGetPr(A);
00612         Init(valini);
00613     }
00614 }
00615 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00616 inline MatlabMatrix::MatlabMatrix(SimStruct *S,int_T port,int_T  nbl,int_T nbc,real_T valini) : RMatrix(nbl,nbc,NULL)
00617 {
00618     const mxArray *A;
00619     String Name;
00620     ParamString(S,port,Name);
00621     
00622     A=ExistMatlabMatrix(Name,"base",nbl,nbc);
00623     if (A)
00624     {   // The matrix exists
00625         T=mxGetPr(A);
00626     }
00627     else
00628     {   // The matrix doesn't exist
00629         A=CreateMatlabMatrix(Name,"base",nbl,nbc);
00630         T=mxGetPr(A);
00631         Init(valini);
00632     }
00633 }
00634 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00635 inline void MatlabMatrix::operator=(const RMatrix & M)
00636 {
00637     RMatrix::operator =(M);
00638 }

00656 inline void mexErrMsgTxt(char * Error_MSG)
00657 {
